title: I Wanna Dance With Somebody
lyrics:
[intro] (C)
 
(C) Clock strikes (G)upon the hour and the (Am)sun begins to (F)fade
(C) Still enough time to (G)figure out how to (Am)chase my blues (F)away
(Dm) I've done alright (G)up 'til now, it's the (C)light of day that (F)shows me how
And (Dm)when the night (G)falls, my (Dm)loneliness (F)calls
[chorus]
(C) Oh! I wanna dance with somebody
(C) I wanna feel the heat with somebody
(Am) Yeah! I wanna dance with somebody
(F) With somebody who (G)loves me
[chorus again!]
(C) Oh! I wanna dance with somebody
(C) I wanna feel the heat with somebody
(Am) Yeah! I wanna dance with somebody
(F) With somebody who (G)loves me
(C) I've been in love and (G)lost my senses (Am)spinning through the (F)town
(C) Sooner or later the (G)fever ends, and I (Am)wind up feeling (F)down
(Dm) I need a man who'll (G)take a chance on a (C)love that burns hot (F)enough to last
So (Dm)when the(G)night (Dm)falls, my lonely heart (F)calls
 
[chorus]
(C) Oh! I wanna dance with somebody
(C) I wanna feel the heat with somebody
(Am) Yeah! I wanna dance with somebody
(F) With somebody who (G)loves me
[chorus again!]
(C) Oh! I wanna dance with somebody
(C) I wanna feel the heat with somebody
(Am) Yeah! I wanna dance with somebody
(F) With some(G)body who loves me (C-single strum) [end]
